channel.title: The Sapling devlogs
channel.description: The developer logs for the videogame The Sapling, a game about life and evolution

item.title: Under the hood of the procedural music in The Sapling
item.description: This article is an in-depth interactive explanation of how the procedural music in The Sapling works. Furthermore, we see how I had to give up my preference for clear hummable melodies, but got my way in the end.

item.title: Breakdown of the visual style of The Sapling
item.description: In this article I'll show you how the graphical style of The Sapling is achieved, step by step. At the bottom there's an interactive scene so you can turn various steps on and off.

item.title: How player content works in The Sapling
item.description: The Sapling was built from the ground up with community interaction in mind. This interaction goes both ways: players can take stuff generated by or for the game, and use it in their own creations, or they can add their own creations to the game.
